original_title: Archeology Dept. DG resigns after being slammed by President
original_body_lines: Days after he was slammed by the President, Director General of the Department of Archaeology Prof. Anura Manatunga tendered his resignation letter to the Ministry Secretary, Minister Vidura Wickramanayaka said.

“The Director General of Archeology has sent his resignation letter to the Ministry Secretary and I also received a copy of the letter. No reason has been given for the resignation,” the minister told Daily Mirror.
President Ranil Wickremesinghe slammed the DG over an issue pertaining to the allocation of lands to an Archaeological site.
The President asked him "Are you trying to teach me history? Or do you want me to teach you?"
